root: ^<sp:25>Oh, it’s another person! Hey! Over here!
^<sp:25>Ah! There you are! I’ve been expecting you!
^<sp:25>You’ve been expecting-nevermind that, where are we right now?
^<sp:25>Well, he did tell me you’d have forgotten.
^<sp:25>We are currently at the Dream Campus, which I am the current representative of!
^<sp:25>You've just sparked like, I dunno, 20 <anim:wave>more</anim> questions from me.
^<sp:25>But ok, Cinder, where is the Dream Campus? Like, physically speaking?
^<sp:25>That might be a question for E-Col. I’m not sure it’s for me to say.
^<sp:25>But I CAN tell you one thing. You’re not in Kansas anymore.
^<sp:25>...sigh...You people are so mysterious. Ok. Where can I find this E-Col fella?
^<sp:25>Waaay up there, you see that tower? That’s Cortex Tower. You’ll find him in there.
